title: Mick Doohan
creator_credit: Sergi Sendra, Paco Latorre and Dorna
brief_description: This extensive profile of motorcycle racing world champion Mick Doohan charts the major milestones of his remarkable career from 1992-1996. Footage of his most memorable races is backgrounded by an extensive personal interview. His family, mechanics, friends and race rivals also give insights into his personal life and career.
